entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT
